Package org.cpnsim.core

Interface Factory

All Known Implementing Classes:
FactorySimple
public interface Factory
An interface that implements a method factory. Its main function is to realize that after the user initializes through the file, it can initialize the components of the simulation system in different ways according to the component names provided by the file. So when the user customizes a component with different methods, it needs to be registered here. Then it can be initialized through the file. Current components are: IntraScheduler, PredictionManager, InterScheduler, LoadBalance, ConflictHandler.
Since:
LGDCloudSim 1.0
Author:
Jiawen Liu

  • Method Details

    • getIntraScheduler

      IntraScheduler getIntraScheduler(String type, int id, int firstPartitionId, int partitionNum)
      Get the IntraScheduler by the type name and some parameters.
      Parameters:
      type - the type name of the intra-scheduler.
      id - the id of the intra-scheduler.
      firstPartitionId - the first synchronization partition id of the intra-scheduler.
      partitionNum - the number of partitions in the data center.
      Returns:
      the intra-scheduler.

    • getInterScheduler

      InterScheduler getInterScheduler(String type, int id, Simulation simulation, int collaborationId, int target, boolean isSupportForward)
      Get the InterScheduler by the type name and some parameters.
      Parameters:
      type - the type name of the inter-scheduler.
      id - the id of the inter-scheduler.
      simulation - the simulation object.
      collaborationId - the collaboration id of the inter-scheduler.
      target - the target id of the inter-scheduler.
      isSupportForward - whether the inter-scheduler supports forward.
      Returns:
      the inter-scheduler.
